post.summary: create: Create a new Device instance

delete.summary: delete: Perform a logical delete on a Device instance

requestBody.description: Patch to apply to a FHIR Device record

put.summary: update,create: Update or Create a Device instance

get.summary: vread: Read Device instance with specific version

post.summary: operation: execute the Add profiles, tags, and security labels to a resource operation
operation: execute the Delete profiles, tags, and security labels for a resource operation
operation: execute the Access a list of profiles, tags, and security labels operation
operation: execute the Access a list of profiles, tags, and security labels operation

OperationOutcome.description: Information about the success/failure of an action

_pretty.name: _pretty
_pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

_elements.name: _elements
_elements.description: Ask for a particular set of elements to be returned

_summary.name: _summary
_summary.description: Return only portions of resources, based on pre-defined levels

_content.name: _content
_content.description: Search on the entire content of the resource

_in.name: _in
_in.description: Allows for the retrieval of resources that are active members of a CareTeam, Group, or List

_lastUpdated.name: _lastUpdated
_lastUpdated.description: When the resource version last changed

_list.name: _list
_list.description: Allows for the retrieval of resources that are referenced by a List resource or by one of the pre-defined functional lists

_profile.name: _profile
_profile.description: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

_query.name: _query
_query.description: A custom search profile that describes a specific defined query operation

_security.name: _security
_security.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

_source.name: _source
_source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

_text.name: _text
_text.description: Perform searches against the narrative content of a resource

_contained.name: _contained
_contained.description: Request different types of handling for contained resources

_count.name: _count
_count.description: Limit the number of match results per page of response

_graph.name: _graph
_graph.description: Include additional resources according to a GraphDefinition

_include.name: _include
_include.description: Include additional resources, based on following links forward across references

_revinclude.name: _revinclude
_revinclude.description: Include additional resources, based on following reverse links across references

_sort.name: _sort
_sort.description: Request which order results should be returned in

_total.name: _total
_total.description: Request a precision of the total number of results for a request

device-name.name: device-name
device-name.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in Device.deviceName or Device.type.

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: The unique identifier associated with the specimen

location.name: location
location.description: This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

manufacturer.name: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Returns medications made or sold for this manufacturer

organization.name: organization
organization.description: The organization that is the custodian of the patient record

patient.name: patient
patient.description: The identity of a patient to search for individual measure report results for

status.name: status
status.description: The status of the measure report

udi-carrier.name: udi-carrier
udi-carrier.description: UDI Barcode (RFID or other technology) string in *HRF* format.

url.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [CapabilityStatement](capabilitystatement.html): The uri that identifies the capability statement
* [CodeSystem](codesystem.html): The uri that identifies the code system
* [CompartmentDefinition](compartmentdefinition.html): The uri that identifies the compartment definition
* [ConceptMap](conceptmap.html): The uri that identifies the concept map
* [GraphDefinition](graphdefinition.html): The uri that identifies the graph definition
* [ImplementationGuide](implementationguide.html): The uri that identifies the implementation guide
* [MessageDefinition](messagedefinition.html): The uri that identifies the message definition
* [OperationDefinition](operationdefinition.html): The uri that identifies the operation definition
* [SearchParameter](searchparameter.html): The uri that identifies the search parameter
* [StructureDefinition](structuredefinition.html): The uri that identifies the structure definition
* [StructureMap](structuremap.html): The uri that identifies the structure map
* [TerminologyCapabilities](terminologycapabilities.html): The uri that identifies the terminology capabilities
* [ValueSet](valueset.html): The uri that identifies the value set
